    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from pandas import DataFrame
    4: import pandas._testing as tm
    5: 
    6: 
    7: class TestGet:
    8:     def test_get(self, float_frame):
    9:         b = float_frame.get("B")
   10:         tm.assert_series_equal(b, float_frame["B"])
   11: 
   12:         assert float_frame.get("foo") is None
   13:         tm.assert_series_equal(
   14:             float_frame.get("foo", float_frame["B"]), float_frame["B"]
   15:         )
   16: 
   17:     @pytest.mark.parametrize(
   18:         "df",
   19:         [
   20:             DataFrame(),
   21:             DataFrame(columns=list("AB")),
   22:             DataFrame(columns=list("AB"), index=range(3)),
   23:         ],
   24:     )
   25:     def test_get_none(self, df):
   26:         # see gh-5652
   27:         assert df.get(None) is None
